solution_line_template: He works out for {hours_per_class}*{minutes_per_hour}=<<{hours_per_class}*{minutes_per_hour}={minutes_per_class}>>{minutes_per_class} minutes per class
So he burns {minutes_per_class}*{calories_per_minute}=<<{minutes_per_class}*{calories_per_minute}={calories_per_class}>>{calories_per_class} calories per class
That means he burns {calories_per_class}*{classes_per_week}=<<{calories_per_class}*{classes_per_week}={total_calories_per_week}>>{total_calories_per_week} calories per week
